experience.title: Investment Professional
experience.description: DAMAC Capital is the investment arm of the DAMAC Group, a prominent conglomerate based in Dubai, UAE, focuses on high-growth sectors like technology, Biotech, AI, and fintech. It has invested in over 50 global funds, collaborating closely with top fund managers as an LP, and holds stakes in leading companies such as SpaceX, Stripe, Anthropic, Mistral and X.ai.  DAMAC Capital drives innovation through strategic investments, solidifying DAMAC Group’s position as a global leader in forward-thinking ventures and transformative industries.

experience.title: Investment Professional
experience.description: Jeejeebhoy Family Office is a multi-stage investor partnering with exceptional founders building disruptive, technology-driven companies. We invest across Seed to Series B rounds, with a focus on Pre-Series A and Series A stages. While sector-agnostic, we often co-invest alongside leading venture funds, with a primary focus on India.

experience.title: Investment Associate
experience.description: SGAN, an early-stage VC firm backed by the Thakral Group, was part of portfolio management, performance tracking, fund analysis, and sector research. I leveraged industry expertise and data-driven insights to support investment and exit decisions.

experience.title: Financial Strategist
experience.description: Experienced finance professional with a proven track record in managing finance operations for three startups. As a key team member, I collaborated with founders on finance, fundraising, budgeting, and financial modeling. Skilled in building investor relationships, crafting fundraising strategies, and delivering detailed reports for senior management and investors.

experience.title: Equity Analyst
experience.description: I have supported over 20 startups in creating their Investor Memorandums, Business Plans, and Financial Models by conducting in-depth market research focused on market penetration, product adoption, and funding requirements.

experience.title: Founder at Klick2collect.com
experience.description: Klick2collect offers delivery designed around your lifestyle, putting convenience in your hands. Frustrated by inconvenient online delivery experiences, we built a system that works entirely on your terms. You decide when and where to receive your order. Klick it to collect it—your delivery, your way.
